events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday; my vehicle sustained significant front-end damage and I want to file a claim immediately.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of damages and incident details submitted.
An agent has been assigned to your case who will guide you through the next steps and answer any questions about your auto accident claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim for the vehicle collision and assure you that we will process it promptly.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driverâ€™s license to proceed with your auto accident claim investigation.
The requested photos and police report have been uploaded successfully for your car accident claim review.
Our claims team has begun the investigation into the circumstances of your vehicle collision and damage assessment.
The investigation for your auto accident claim has concluded. We have reviewed all submitted evidence and assessed the damages.
We propose a settlement amount to cover the repairs of your vehicle based on the damage evaluation provided by the adjuster.
Thank you for your response regarding the proposed settlement for your car accident claim. We will review your feedback carefully.
Your auto accident claim has been approved for the settlement amount previously communicated to you. Repair work can commence.
The payment covering your vehicle repair costs has been disbursed to your designated account as part of your approved claim settlement.
Your case for the auto accident claim is now officially closed. We hope our handling met your expectations and wish you safe travels ahead.
All documents and records related to your auto accident claim have been securely archived and can be retrieved upon future request.
